reviews.review: yes
Yet another masterpiece from Valve!
I've heard a lot of this game so I decided to buy it, and man it's the greatest game I've ever played, it's funny and mind-puzzling. Loved it.

/*********************************
* WARNING
* This game contains a very 
* high level of robotic
* sarcasm. You will love it.
*********************************/

Humorous and witty, definitely entertaining!
The co-op mode is a blast with friends. Death hilarity ensues.

Mejor que el primero, si cabe. El primero se acaba quedando corto y además, estaba deseando terminarlo para empezar el modo colaborativo, que éste sí tiene. JUEGAZO!!! La canción del final, como siempre, tremenda XD
bem loko
This game was cool, you should buy it. Yada yada ying-yang. Im only doing this for the acheivement. Thanks bruh.

This game I'll tell ya.  It's fun, makes a lot of jokes, but is also so complex.  It's difficult balancing the puzzles themselves and the story behind Glados, but it holds up.  For some it's easier than others, for someone like myself, well, I looked at a lot of walkthroughs.  Still an awesome game by all means.
très bon jeu même si malheureusement trop vite fini (9h)

Portal 2 je skvele pokracovani dobreho Portalu 1. Valve, opet jste zabodovali.


+ Dobra grafika
+ Skvely pribeh
+ Uzasny Co-op 
+ Vylepsovani robotu v co-opu
+ Humor
+ Propracovanost
+ Hratelnost
+ Easter eggy
+ Turret song


- U nekterych casti se proste zaseknete,
protoze neni uplne jasne, kam jit dal


Shrnuto : Portal 2 je temer dokonala hra. S velmi dobrym pribehem a skvelym co-opem se radi mezi jedny z nejlepsich her na Steamu. 

[b] Za me 97% [/b]

之前看到传送门2特价,没有多想就直接入手了。
花了17个小时把单人模式通关，我个人很喜欢这类动脑筋的游戏。没错，有些关卡没有思路的话不知道会花上多长时间。游戏的画面配音的十分不错，值得入手。
Great game. I recomment it to everyone. You don't have to love pussle games to enjoy it

Игра несомненно хорошая. Есть неплохая сюжетная линия, когда я впервые узнал про эту игру и посмотрел игровой процесс, мне показалось что она сложная. Но как только попробовал сыграть сам к моему большему удивлению она мне понравилась:) Хотелось бы продолжения в новой части игры, если оно все же будет я надеюсь получится не хуже чем две первые части. 
      P.S. Обязательно сыграйте и оцените ее сами;)
Очень классная головоломка! Игра супер, даже сюжет есть и много приколов!) Мне нравится!

Everything from the gameplay to the dialogue to the humor and puzzles is incredible. There is nothing I would change about this game. TO THE MOON.

Dont let my hours fool you. I played this on the 360 like crazy.

Cave Johnson does moon rock dust like cocaine

Cave Johnson demands to see life's manager

Cave Johnson's wife tries to kill you.... on multiple occasions

Cave Johnson puts asbestos in the gel

Cave Johnson made mantis men

Cave Johnson made a test for killing mantis men

Cave Johnson had a bad cough

Cave Johnson was... well... a jack wad. but not just any jack wad.... my favorite jack wad.

And throughout all of his jack wadism..... Chell never offer a single word of complaint or criticism. 

Combustible lemons/10

Portal 2...Portal 2...Why isn't there a Portal 3?
BEST GAME EVER

开始时仍旧是炫目的科技风格，只不过同一代相比我们还可以看到更多的废墟，先进与腐朽巧妙地结合在了一起。
个人认为本作的高潮是“坠落”关卡中关于早期光圈科技的各种实验，繁荣磅礴的规模在寂静无人的环境里仿佛像主角这个突如其来的闯入者诉说着尘封的故事，又使人感到一丝恐惧。但也会被话痨Cave Johnson将这种情绪一扫而空，也逐渐了解到神秘女人Caroline和Cave Johnson的微妙关系。
当然最吸引人的还是破解关卡的成就感。
一部好的游戏，也是回忆的一部分。


p.s. 为了提名任务。
Great Game
Why is the Cake a Lie because this game is NOT a lie

This game is by far one of the best games I've ever played. This is a must have for everyone.

非常有意思的游戏，比起现在大部分做的越来越真实，越来越电影化的游戏，portal2既有它单纯的游戏性，又有着不俗的剧情和非常出彩的人物刻画，设定上也是神作。
best puzzle game ever.

Portal 2 is a very unique gaming exprience that combines FPS and puzzle concepts into one of Steam's most liked game. This game has freaking 99% positive reviews! This is the ONLY game that combines those two elements of gameplay, and that's what makes it special. So, for everone who attributed and is attributing to this game, I LOVE YOU!
Holy snap like, I want to see someone not love glados.
Excelente :D

10/10. Amazing sequel to the first game. Same mechanics, with a few new elements and storywise you get most of your questions answered(there is the comic too). The soundtrack is impeccable. If you haven't played the first one, you should before playing this.

The cake is a lie!
Entretenido, original, modo multijugador, plagado de humor.
Recomendable

Oooh what fun! Even if you haven't played portal 1, play this. It's too good to pass up. And it has multiplayer, too! It's endlessly fun to solve puzzles together with your friends as expendable lab robots. Seriously, play this game.
Very difficult puzzles vith great story and variety. Once you beat the game, you can play user created levels, therefore the game never ends.
It's aite.
Great game! Better than (or just as good as) portal 1. But you must play both!
Ни разу не сомневалась в покупке. Прекрасное продолжение прекрасной игры.

I cannot recommend this game highly enough.  It has a great plot, well designed environments with a great sense of atmosphere, fun gameplay that's challenging enough to keep one engaged without feeling frustrated, good characters, memorable lines, fantastic music, and a well-designed co-op campaign.

My only complaint is that some of the multiplayer achievements can be a tad frustrating.

Definitely worth the purchase

So, I got the game recently during the Valentines Day sale 2015 for 75% off, and I just gotta say... That THIS GAME IS THE BEST FUCKING GAME EVER! If you're a living being that is intelligent enough to play a computer game, then THIS GAME IS 100% FOR YOU! Filled with the best gameplay I've ever seen, the best type of humour, SUPER ORIGINAL GAMEPLAY AND MUSIC, AND ITS A GREAT DEAL TOO! 11/10 WOULD PORTAL 2 AGAIN!
